review_text: Bad: The bed was very uncomfortable. Lumpy and too soft. Good: Central location. Easy check-in and out. Nice touches. Access to breakfast on each floor with a tray to use in your room-protein from hard boiled egg and yogurt, fresh baked goods, cereal (hot and cold). Fitness center had a variety of cardio equipment and weights.
review_title: Nice amenities but beds should be replaced.
